name: 2D Space Shooter Movement Prototype
description:
Since I don't have a demo for this Demo Day I thought I'd use this opportunity to maybe get some feedback on an old prototype I'm interested in developing further. I'm mostly curious what people think about the player movement, everything else is pretty unimportant right now. 

Keyboard controls:

Mouse - turn ship

W  - thrust

A, D - strafe

Shift + W - dash

LMB - fire

Gamepad controls:

Left Stick - turn ship

Y - thrust

LT, RT - strafe

RB + Y - dash

A - fire
